title: Technologist Medium Skin Tone
description: Represents a person working in technology, with a medium skin tone. This emoji is often used to signify coding, development, or general tech-related activities.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's technologist emoji, rendered with a medium skin tone, embodies innovation and intellect with its clean design and subtle 3D shading. The individual is depicted wearing glasses and often holding a laptop or other electronic device, showcasing Apple's focus on modern professions with realistic lighting that highlights their engaged posture. This emoji, with its soft rounded edges, is ideal for representing roles in tech, coding, or any digital pursuit, reflecting a dedication to progress and creativity.
